This is a sandbox, a code chunk to run R code using webR. data.table and ggplot2 are already loaded along with the Rolling Stone data set. Everything is ready to run the tutorial's examples and exercises.

library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

rolling_stone <- fread('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2024/2024-05-07/rolling_stone.csv')
